```{python}
import frontmatter
from pathlib import Path
from datetime import datetime

# Recursively find all .qmd files
files = list(Path(".").rglob("*.qmd"))

posts = []

for f in files:
    if "index.qmd" in str(f):  # skip index pages
        continue
    try:
        post = frontmatter.load(f)
        date_str = post.get("date", None)
        title = post.get("title", f.stem)
        if date_str:
            date = datetime.fromisoformat(str(date_str))
            posts.append((date, title, f.as_posix()))
    except Exception as e:
        continue  # skip broken files

# Sort by date descending
posts.sort(reverse=True)

# Show only the newest 5
for date, title, path in posts[:5]:
    print(f"- [{title}]({path}) ({date.date()})")

```
